Summary: Tumbling triangle w 3 lights aprox 600 ft. video on Iphone
divs: sighting detailsmy adult son and his friend were outside in front of the house when they saw a very large triangular craft in the sky. at first only two very bright orange lights were visable. soon after there were three and they realized the craft was tumbling. they followed it in the car for about a mile before it went out of sight. it was traveling ne from tomball tx at 9:20 pm. on 11\08\13. they took video on an i phone. this was seen by many people in the subdevision. we live in the flight path of iah and are familiar with plane traffic. this was not an airplane. it was aprox. 600 ft and about as tall as a 747, dark in color.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Tomball
There were no other sightings in Tomball on or around November 8th 2013
